title: Stuck in the queue (Please Help) (Not been able to play league)
body:
I want to play league of legends...

However 90% of the time I press find a match the timer will count and count and count.... when its been a couple minutes (when the expected wait time is 44 secs) I press cancel.... nothing happens, I am stuck so I task manager and close league and start again by the end of it I get a notice that says you have skipped to many matches....

BUT I HAVE NEVER BEEN GIVEN THE CHANCE TO ACCEPT OR DECLINE!!!!!!

Has anyone had this issue? is this something I need to fix on my end? or is there something wrong with my internet connection? I do a speed test and I amd 13ms ping and 35mb/s download speed. Is that not sufficient? should I switch internet providers?

replies.body: Closing out of League like that might not actually stop the queue process. It sounds like that queue was left running while the client was forcibly closed which made you miss the "queue" that your account was still in. This can also happen when you network is having issues, which would delay the match found notification since your network isn't working fast enough. Check out the steps we have listed on port forwarding and on how to configure your DNS listed in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and test it in a custom or practice match.

Thank you for replying! I will be going through the connection guide tonight to try this out! 

Thanks Again!
